Question: Garrow noted that this person's promiscuity caused him "painful and at times overwhelming guilt".
Hints: This person quoted Tolstoy's War and Peace as well in 1959.
This person was booked in room 306 at the Lorraine Motel, owned by Walter Bailey, in Memphis.
This person became pastor of the Dexter Avenue Baptist Church in Montgomery, Alabama, when he was twenty-five years old, in 1954.
